                  java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Opens the connection to the server
        Parameters:
        connect_to_ip - ip of the server
        port - ports of the server
        password - password for the connection
        controller - The reference to the GameController
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - network severe
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - invalid password
